312967.「もはや ここまでか……。\n 老体には 堪えるわい。:
So, this is as far as I go...
This old body of mine can't take much
more...

312968.「大長老さま……ごめんなさい。\n あたしも 初めは 石の開発に協力するなんて\:
I'm sorry, Great Elder...
At first, I didn't want to develop a new stone
either...

312969.「でも わかったの。\n この世界には バシッルーラストーンを\n 必要としてい:
But then I realized... I realized there's
people out there who need a
Bazoomstone!

312970.「だから あたしたちの役目を\n この石に 託そうよ。:
That's why we gotta put our faith into this
stone.

312971.「古きものは 所詮……消えゆく運命。\n 時代の流れには 逆らえんということか…:
In the end, old things...they're destined to
one day disappear. Time marches on...
There's no fighting that.

312972.「……ラルゥ殿 これまでの 数々の非礼\n 深く お詫びしますじゃ。\n どうか:
Larue...I deeply apologize for my abhorrent
behavior. Please finish your work to complete
the stone.

312973.「お任せください！\n あなたのご覚悟 決して 無駄にはしません。\n さっそく:
You can leave that to me! I won't let your
resolve be for nothing. The Curseweaver Needle
N will be finished straight away!

312974.ラルゥは 交呪の魔針を取り出すと\nシンリィから 虚空の針金を受け取り\n交呪の:
Larue takes out the Curseweaver Needle and
receives the Void Wire from Shinry, using both
to create the Curseweaver Needle N!

312975.そして シンリィの杖に 取り付けていた\n交呪の魔針を取り外し 試作品の石と\n:
He then removes the Curseweaver Needle attached to Shinry's staff, attaching the prototype stone and the Curseweaver Needle N
instead!

312977.「あとは あたしが この杖を持って\n ナドラガンドに行けば ナドラガンドの\n:
If I take this staff to Nadragand, then I'll
be able to fly to its various regions!

312978.「はい。これで 開発の最終段階まで完了です。\n 私が 世界宿屋協会に報告すれば:
Yes. This marks the final stage of development. After I report this to the World Association of Innkeepers, then we can look to
mass producing the stone.

312979.「シンリィ ご苦労じゃった。\n バンリィたちを呼び戻し バシルーラ屋は\n 閉:
You've done marvelously, Shinry.
Let's call the other girls here so that we can
go ahead and shut down the Bazoom service...

312981.「あなたは……\n 世界宿屋協会 ゼネラルマネージャーの\n ロクサーヌさん！:
The General Manager of the World Association
of Innkeepers...Ms. Sellma! What a surprise!

312982.「これまで あなたたち バシっ娘に\n 送ってもらった多くの方々から バシルーラ:
We've received many requests from those you
have helped, telling us not to shut down the
Bazoom service.

312983.「おまえさん この間は ありがとうよ。: Thank you for your help just the other day!

312984.「あっ 地底湖の洞くつから 飛び先がズレたとき\n 井戸に住んでた おじいさん…:
Oh! You're that old man from the well...when the teleport in the Underground Lake Cave went all off target! Were you able to safely get a
Mega Zoomstone?

312985.「ああ 手に入れたとも。そのおかげで\n いろんな場所に 行けるようになったんじ:
Yes, indeed. Thanks to that stone, I'm able to
go to all sorts of place. But still...it
somehow doesn't feel quite right.

312986.「わしゃ おまえさんが バシルーラで\n 飛ばしてくれた時 見送ってくれたことの:
It was then I realized that I was happier
when it was you using Bazoom to send
me on my way.

312988.「チャーベンさんだけでは ありません。\n あなたたちが 送り出してくれることが:
And it's not just Chaben here who feels this
way. Everyone said the same thing about
being happy when they were sent off.

312989.「どんなに 便利な石があっても\n 心を込めて 送り出す……それは\n あなたた:
No matter how convenient that stone may be, a
heartfelt send-off for somebody... That's
something only you can do.

312990.「なんということじゃ……。\n わしは その石のせいで バシルーラ屋など\n 不:
Color me surprised... I thought that the
Bazoom service would become obsolete
with the advent of that stone...

312991.「わしが 一番 バシルーラ屋の大切さを\n わかっておらんかったのじゃな……。:
I suppose I was the one who least understood
the importance of the Bazoom service...

312992.「大長老さま……お姉さまたちは これからも\n バシルーラ屋を 続けていいんだよ:
Great Elder... My sisters and I can keep
running our Bazoom service, can't we?!

312994.「ナドラガンドには わしが 行くとしよう。\n シンリィ……おまえは この町で\:
I'll go to Nadragand.
You should stay and run the Bazoom service
for this town.

312996.「さよう。\n 新しい杖は 用意しておくからの。:
Indeed. I'll have a new staff prepared for
you.

312998.「ラルゥ……完成した石についての報告は\n 後日 聞かせてくださいね。:
Larue... Please report to me about the
completed stone when you are able.

313000.「<cs_pchero>。今まで 手伝ってくれて\n ありがとう。石を 完成させ:
Thanks for all your help, <cs_pchero>.
I couldn't have completed the stone without
you!

313001.「このバシッルーラストーンは 一番に\n <cs_pchero>に 使ってほしい:
I want you to be the first to use this
Bazoomstone!

313002.「それと 今 キミが持っている\n バシッルーラストーンは リサイクルするから\:
I'll recycle the Bazoomstone you have now, so
I'll take it off your hands.

313004.「……って <cs_pchero>は もう 完成した\n バシッルーラストーン:
...I see you already have a completed
Bazoomstone. In that case, I'll give you this
instead.

313005.「その石が あっても あたしたちバシっ娘に\n 送ってほしい時は いつでも 言っ:
I know you have that new stone, but if you
ever need a Bazoom Girl to send you off,
please come and visit!

329247.「心を込めたルルルンポゥで お届けするからさ！:
I'll send you off with a heartfelt zuzuzulo,
just for you!
